message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be a great fit for you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000. Can you consider that?
